title: Define all custom message types for engine communication
closed_reason: Added all custom message types for engine->TUI communication: tickMsg, IterationStartMsg, IterationEndMsg, OutputMsg, SignalMsg, ErrorMsg, RunCompleteMsg, TasksUpdateMsg. Also added tickCmd() function returning tea.Tick for 1-second heartbeat. All types added with descriptive comments in a new section after TaskInfo helper methods.
